an4.40:4.1: Atha kho udāyī brāhmaṇo yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
an4.40:4.2: upasaṅkamitvā bhagavatā … pe … ekamantaṃ nisinno kho udāyī brāhmaṇo bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
an4.40:4.4: “Na kho ahaṃ, brāhmaṇa, sabbaṃ yaññaṃ vaṇṇemi;
an4.40:4.5: na panāhaṃ, brāhmaṇa, sabbaṃ yaññaṃ na vaṇṇemi.
an4.40:4.6: Yathārūpe kho, brāhmaṇa, yaññe gāvo haññanti, ajeḷakā haññanti, kukkuṭasūkarā haññanti, vividhā pāṇā saṅghātaṃ āpajjanti;
an4.40:4.7: evarūpaṃ kho ahaṃ, brāhmaṇa, sārambhaṃ yaññaṃ na vaṇṇemi.
an4.40:4.9: Evarūpañhi, brāhmaṇa, sārambhaṃ yaññaṃ na upasaṅkamanti arahanto vā arahattamaggaṃ vā samāpannā.
an4.40:5.1: Yathārūpe ca kho, brāhmaṇa, yaññe neva gāvo haññanti, na ajeḷakā haññanti, na kukkuṭasūkarā haññanti, na vividhā pāṇā saṅghātaṃ āpajjanti;
an4.40:5.2: evarūpaṃ kho ahaṃ, brāhmaṇa, nirārambhaṃ yaññaṃ vaṇṇemi, yadidaṃ niccadānaṃ anukulayaññaṃ.
an4.40:5.4: Evarūpañhi, brāhmaṇa, nirārambhaṃ yaññaṃ upasaṅkamanti arahanto vā arahattamaggaṃ vā samāpannāti.
an4.40:7.1: Vivaṭacchadā ye loke,
an4.40:7.4: buddhā yaññassa kovidā.
an4.40:8.2: habyaṃ katvā yathārahaṃ;
an4.40:9.1: Suhutaṃ suyiṭṭhaṃ suppattaṃ,
an4.40:10.1: * Evaṃ yajitvā medhāvī,
an4.40:10.3: Abyābajjhaṃ sukhaṃ lokaṃ,
